actions.name: get label
actions.schemaDefinition: let template const temp = row.observedTemperature2 if (typeof temp === 'number') { if(temp >= -1 && temp <= 1) { template = ` Iced Point Method Pass ` } else { template = ` Iced Point Method Fail ` } } else { template = ` Iced Point Method ` } schema = { title: template }

actions.name: get content
actions.schemaDefinition:
const upperIndex = instance.parent.parent.parent.parent.parent._rowIndex const referenceValue = instance.parent.parent.parent.parent.parent.parent.components[upperIndex]._data.referenceValue const temp = row.observedTemperature4 const tolerant = 1 let status if(typeof temp === 'number' && typeof referenceValue === 'number') { status = temp >= (referenceValue - 1) && temp <= (referenceValue + 1) ? 'Pass' : 'Fail' } else { status = '' } const template = `
Status
${status}
` schema = { content: template }
